thorathuru thakshanaye ha anekuth thakshaya bhawithaye aarambhayath samanga wyapara kshetha්raya, idikarim kshetha්raya, karmantha kshetha්raya, adhyapana kshetha්raya, mulyakshetha්raya, saukhya kshetha්raya, pa්rawahana kshetha්raya, jana sanniwedana kshetha්raya, abhyawakasha paryeshana kshethraya yanadi sama kshethrayakama purna wenas kam siduwiya.jangama upakarana kramalekhanaya, pariganaka kramalekhanaya ha web kramalekhanaya diyunu wimath samanga ihatha ki sama kshethrayakama nawa muhunu warak athi wi thibe.

owun ee sandaha itha siyum upakrama bhawitha karathi.pakisthana jawaramkaruwan athara aktha bayi pradhana pele jawaram karuwek lesa polisiya handunagena thibe.pakisthana rahas oththu sewaye da sewaya kara athi aktha bayi lankawa wetha menma aasiyathika ratawal kipayakama heroyin jawarame niratha pudgalayaku lesa handunagena thibe.esema indiya mudal horata mudranaya kirima menma mafiya kalliyakata sambandhawa katayuthu kirima pilibandawa antharjathika polisiya mangin athadanguwata ganimata soyamin sitinneki.namuth merata kanthawan samanga da sabandatha pawathwamin ohu thawaduratath merata siya thahanam wyaparaye nirathawa sitina bawata thorathuru heliwi atha.
